t: CPSC Warns Consumers to Immediately Stop Using CEINOL Brand Bathroom Faucets Sold on Amazon.com Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children | CPSC.gov

t: OTC drugmakers face an uphill battle on Amazon. But they should still be there, expert says | Fierce Pharma
s: November 19, 2018 - Amazon is now the third-largest digital ad platform, but pharma marketers are mostly shut out. | As Amazon works to solidify its healthcare and online OTC drug sales plans, pharma marketers with OTC brands should be figuring out their own strategies for the platform, one expert says.
